translation:
My President Piratini, December 10, 1838.

Send me the ounces I requested, it is enough that you send me only sixty ounces, so that I can immediately have them enter and exit the Treasury for Matos and Antônio Gonçalves, who already want them for travel provisions; and I promised to send them to them.

From Your Excellency Almeida
